concept.title: Selling Products
concept.shortdesc: Now that you have your store created, your next step is to populate your store with products or services to be presented to your customers.

conbody.p: With the Shopify platform, you will have the ability to reach your customers via your website online and in person.
Customers will be able to reach your site from their web browser directly or through Facebook campaigns.
You will also be able to sell to customers face to face. This will allow you to quickly expand your business or establish a physical storefront or booth at a fair.
